mapper.insert: insert into user(email, pwd, name, tel_no, eml_auth_tkn, in_user, up_user) value (#{email}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{telNo}, #{emlAuthTkn}, current_user , current_user)
mapper.select: select email, pwd, userT.enabled, roleT.code_name as roleCode from ( select email, pwd, enabled, role_code from user where email = #{email} ) userT, ( select * from cmmn_code where code_type = "USER_ROLE" ) roleT where userT.role_code = roleT.code ;
